column4: I am running ubuntu 11.04, can anyone help me install a opengl 4.0 driver?
you want the open source or proprietary driver?
and why am i still here after 3am?
proprietary or open, I am agnostic to the potential ethics involved :P. I am on a geforce 525m
see if that has a recommendation for you
the descriptions are pretty vage, just NVIDIA accelerated graphics (current) and (post-release updates)
mm. go with recommended or post-release updates
not sure. ask around or google. i'm out
